title: Submit Steel Shop Drawings for Review
description: The steel fabricator has completed their shop drawings. The project manager must submit them to the structural engineer for review and approval.

tasks.description: Create a new submittal package in the project management system for 'Steel Shop Drawings'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new submittal package is created with a unique ID.

tasks.description: Attach the shop drawing files to the submittal package.
tasks.expected_outcome: The relevant drawing files are uploaded and attached.

tasks.description: Forward the submittal package to the structural engineer for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: The submittal is officially sent to the engineer.
